fields.name: Give Bread to the Poor
fields.description: Distribute bread to the poorest citizens to ease their suffering and reduce unrest.

fields.name: Grand Festival
fields.description: Organize a magnificent festival with games, music, and feasting to keep the people happy.

fields.name: Conscription
fields.description: Force able-bodied citizens into military service. They pay a fee to avoid service, but this is unpopular.

fields.name: Tax Holiday
fields.description: Suspend all taxes for one year to win the favor of merchants and citizens alike.

fields.name: Public Works
fields.description: Hire unemployed citizens for public construction projects, reducing unrest and boosting morale.

fields.name: Establish Trade Charter
fields.description: Grant official trade privileges to your city, attracting wealthy merchants and increasing commerce.

fields.name: City Privileges
fields.description: Petition the Emperor for special privileges that enhance your city's autonomy and prestige.

fields.name: Mint City Coinage
fields.description: Gain the right to mint your own coins, a significant step towards economic independence.

fields.name: Imperial Protection
fields.description: Secure direct protection from the Emperor, reducing external threats and unrest.

fields.name: Nightwatch
fields.description: Establish a nightwatch to patrol the streets, maintaining order and reducing unrest among citizens.

fields.name: Stapelrecht
fields.description: Establish staple rights requiring traders to offer their goods in your city first, generating income but causing minor resentment.
